snippet: As a national conversation about sexual abuse, especially of minors, grows very slowly in China, a law muddying the definition of rape of girls younger than 14 is a target of protest among children’s rights activists and feminists.
abstract: As a national conversation about sexual abuse, especially of minors, grows very slowly in China, a law muddying the definition of rape of girls younger than 14 is a target of protest among children’s rights activists and feminists.

headline.main: In China, a Controversial Law Is Seen to Excuse Sex With Minors
